amendment.description: Amendment reduces farm program payment limits, capping commodity payments at $250,000 per year for any one farm. The amendment also closes loopholes in current law to ensure payments reach working farmers, their intended recipients.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 100 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to reduce farm program payment limits, capping commodity payments at $250,000 per year for any one farm. The legislation also closes loopholes in current law to ensure payments reach working farmers, their intended recipients.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A054) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 194 (Roll no. 282).
